| Use case  | Example                                |
| --------- | -------------------------------------- |
| Sorting   | `sorted(list, key=lambda x: x['age'])` |
| Mapping   | `map(lambda x: x + 1, lst)`            |
| Filtering | `filter(lambda x: x > 0, lst)`         |
| Reducing  | `reduce(lambda x, y: x + y, lst)`      |
